meanings.definition: A title at the top of a page or section of a book.
meanings.sent1: The headings in the book helped me find the right chapter.
meanings.sent2: The heading of the page was bold and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: I laughed when I saw the heading upside down on the page.
meanings.sent4: Her name stood out like a heading in a sea of text.
meanings.sent5: The heading was like a beacon guiding me through the book.

meanings.definition: The direction or course in which a ship, aircraft, or vehicle is moving.
meanings.sent1: The captain adjusted the headings to avoid the storm.
meanings.sent2: The headings of the ship were set towards the north.
meanings.sent3: The headings of the plane made the passengers feel dizzy.
meanings.sent4: The headings of the car led us straight to the beach.
meanings.sent5: The headings of the ship pointed towards adventure on the horizon.
